definition: smeared or soiled with grease or oil
details:
adjective
- smeared or soiled with grease or oil
= synonyms: greasy
- containing an unusual amount of grease or oil
= synonyms: greasy
- coated or covered with oil
= example: coated or covered with oil
- unpleasantly and excessively suave or ingratiating in manner or speech
= synonyms: buttery, oleaginous, fulsome, smarmy, soapy, unctuous
